application

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • application.Game

  • public class Game
extends javafx.application.Application
    The Main Game class. Handle's all the player controls as well as the main game loop

    • Nested Class Summary

      • buildCamera

        private void buildCamera()
        Builds the camera. Placed high above the map if debug mode is on, else, set at the correct height on the player spawn

        private void handleMouse(javafx.scene.Scene scene,
                         javafx.scene.Node root)
        Handle mouse.
        Parameters:
        scene - the scene
        root - the root

      • handleUpDownRotation

        private void handleUpDownRotation(double modifier)
        Allows you to look up and down. The light doesn't follow but since being able to look up and down isn't required it doesn't matter. Nice for maneuvering around the map in it's current state. Doesn't allow you to "fly." You're walking on the ground looking around.
        Parameters:
        modifier - the modifier

      • handleKeyboard

        private void handleKeyboard(javafx.scene.Scene scene,
                            Xform worldXform)
        Handle's keyboard input. WASD moves player. Esc key pauses. R "unlock" the mouse cursor
        Parameters:
        scene - the scene
        worldXform - the world xform

      • makeSoundClips

        private void makeSoundClips()
        Initialize the sound clips
